description: This is a Flutter widget defining a login screen with form validation, user input fields, and interaction with an authentication provider.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the login screen UI.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the login form, validation, and user interactions.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text editing controllers when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Validates form, performs login through AuthProvider, and shows success/error messages.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the login screen including form fields and buttons.
